Package dev.majek.pc.data

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataHandler
    This class handles all plugin data storage, config file access, and the main config file.
    LanguageHandler
    This class handles all plugin languages and their config files.
    Metrics
    bStats collects some data for plugin authors.
    Metrics.AdvancedBarChart
    Represents a custom advanced bar chart.
    Metrics.AdvancedPie
    Represents a custom advanced pie.
    Metrics.CustomChart
    Represents a custom chart.
    Metrics.DrilldownPie
    Represents a custom drilldown pie.
    Metrics.MultiLineChart
    Represents a custom multi line chart.
    Metrics.SimpleBarChart
    Represents a custom simple bar chart.
    Metrics.SimplePie
    Represents a custom simple pie.
    Metrics.SingleLineChart
    Represents a custom single line chart.

    Restrictions
